title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Ranger with visitors enjoying the view on the Rim Trail. NPS Photo   Â    **Walnut Canyon National Monument is open 8 AM to 5 p.m. Daily** Preparing for your monumental visit to Walnut Canyon From diverse plant and animal life, to the remains of structures dotted across the canyon, Walnut Canyon National Monument offers a look into the past and how people have adapted to the land and their environment to survive and thrive.Plan your visit today!  Open everyday of the year, except December 25, Walnut Canyon National Monument offers opportunities to explore the visitor center and Rim Trail. Walnut Canyon National Monument welcomes teachers and students to learn and explore. Get started planning your field trip!
